description.english: Found your way back into the ruins of Rapture.
description.french: Vous êtes retourné dans Rapture.
description.german: Den Weg zurück in die Ruinen von Rapture gefunden.
description.italian: Rientrato tra le rovine di Rapture.
description.japanese: ラプチャーの廃墟に戻る方法を見つけた
description.spanish: Has conseguido volver a las ruinas de Rapture.
description.schinese: 设法回到极乐城废墟。

description.english: Defended yourself against Lamb's assault in the train station.
description.french: Vous vous êtes défendu contre l'assaut de Lamb dans la gare.
description.german: Dich vor Lambs Splicer-Angriff im Bahnhof verteidigt.
description.italian: Nella stazione ti sei difeso dagli attacchi dei ricombinanti della Lamb.
description.japanese: 駅でDr.ラムの襲撃を退けた
description.spanish: Te has defendido del ataque de los splicers de Lamb en la estación de tren.
description.schinese: 已在火车站抵御兰姆的进攻。

displayName.japanese: シンクレアのソリューション

description.english: Joined forces with Sinclair in Ryan Amusements.
description.french: Vous avez fait affaire avec Sinclair dans le Parc d'agrément Ryan.
description.german: Mit Sinclair in Ryan Amusements zusammengeschlossen.
description.italian: Alleati con Sinclair al Ryan Amusements.
description.japanese: ライアン遊園地でシンクレアが仲間になった
description.spanish: Has unido fuerzas con Sinclair en Atracciones Ryan.
description.schinese: 已在莱恩娱乐中心和辛克莱会师。

description.english: Confronted Lamb's lieutenant in Pauper's Drop.
description.french: Vous vous êtes confronté au lieutenant de Lamb au Point de Chute.
description.german: Lambs Offizier in Pauper's Drop begegnet.
description.italian: Affrontato il luogotenente della Lamb a Pauper's Drop.
description.japanese: パウパードロップでDr.ラムの右腕と対峙した
description.spanish: Te has enfrentado a la lugarteniente de Lamb en Pauper's Drop.
description.schinese: 已在贫民窟与兰姆的助理对决。

description.english: Defeated the Preacher.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le Père Wales.
description.german: Den Prediger besiegt.
description.italian: Predicatore sconfitto.
description.japanese: 宣教師を倒した
description.spanish: Has vencido al predicador.
description.schinese: 已击败牧师。

description.english: Uncovered the secret of Dionysus Park.
description.french: Vous avez révélé les secrets du Parc Dionysos.
description.german: Das Geheimnis von Dionysus Park entdeckt.
description.italian: Hai scoperto il segreto del Dionysus Park.
description.japanese: ディオニソス・パークの秘密を暴いた
description.spanish: Has descubierto el secreto del parque Dionysus.
description.schinese: 已发现狄俄尼索斯公园的秘密。

description.english: Gained access to Lamb's stronghold.
description.french: Vous avez ouvert l'accès au fief de Lamb.
description.german: Zutritt zu Lambs Basis verschafft.
description.italian: Ottenuto l'accesso alla fortezza della Lamb.
description.japanese: Dr.ラムの要塞へ行けるようになった
description.spanish: Has conseguido acceso a la guarida de Lamb.
description.schinese: 已进入兰姆的要塞。

description.english: Reunited with your original Little Sister.
description.french: Vous avez retrouvé votre Petite Soeur d'origine.
description.german: Deine ursprüngliche Little Sister wiedergefunden.
description.italian: Ricongiunto con la tua Sorellina originale.
description.japanese: 自分のリトルシスターに再会した
description.spanish: Te has reunido con tu Little Sister original.
description.schinese: 已与最初的小妹妹团聚。

description.english: Headed to the surface on the side of Sinclair's escape pod.
description.french: Vous avez regagné la surface avec le bathyscaphe de Sinclair.
description.german: Neben Sinclairs Fluchtkapsel zur Oberfläche gereist.
description.italian: In viaggio verso la superficie a bordo del vascello di fuga di Sinclair.
description.japanese: シンクレアの脱出ポッドで水面へと向かった
description.spanish: Te has dirigido a la superficie en el costado de la cápsula de huida de Sinclair.
description.schinese: 靠著辛克莱逃生舱前往地上。

description.english: Escaped Rapture.
description.french: Vous avez fui Rapture.
description.german: Aus Rapture entkommen.
description.italian: Fuggito da Rapture.
description.japanese: ラプチャーから脱出した
description.spanish: Has escapado de Rapture.
description.schinese: 已逃出极乐城。

description.english: Bought one Plasmid Slot or Tonic Slot at a Gatherer's Garden.
description.french: Vous avez acheté un emplacement pour Plasmide ou pour Fortifiant dans un Jardin des Glaneuses.
description.german: Einen Plasmid- oder Tonikum-Slot an einem Gatherer's Garden gekauft.
description.italian: Acquistato uno slot per plasmide o per tonico presso un Gatherer's Garden.
description.japanese: プラスミドかトニックの追加スロットを入手した
description.spanish: Has comprado una ranura de tónico o plásmido en un Jardín de las recolectoras.
description.schinese: 已在采集者花园购买质体栏位或模块栏位。

description.english: Fully upgraded to the maximum number of Plasmid Slots.
description.french: Vous avez débloqué tous les emplacements pour Plasmides.
description.german: Komplettes Upgrade auf die maximale Anzahl an Plasmid-Slots durchgeführt.
description.italian: Acquisiti tutti gli slot per plasmidi possibili.
description.japanese: プラスミドのスロットを上限まで増やした
description.spanish: Has alcanzado el número máximo de ranuras de plásmidos.
description.schinese: 已将质体栏位数升级至上限。

description.english: Upgraded a weapon at a Power to the People Station.
description.french: Vous avez amélioré une arme dans une station ''Pouvoir au Peuple''.
description.german: Eine Waffe an einer 'Alle Macht dem Volke'-Station verbessert.
description.italian: Potenziata un'arma presso una stazione Power to the People.
description.japanese: 武器強化ステーションで武器をアップグレードした
description.spanish: Has mejorado un arma en un terminal 'Poder para el pueblo'.
description.schinese: 已在人民力量中升级一种武器。

description.english: Installed the third upgrade to a weapon.
description.french: Vous avez installé la troisième amélioration sur une arme.
description.german: Das dritte Upgrade einer Waffe installiert.
description.italian: Terzo potenziamento applicato a un'arma.
description.japanese: 1つの武器に3段階目のアップグレードを施した
description.spanish: Has instalado la tercera mejora de un arma.
description.schinese: 在一把武器上安装第三种升级。

description.english: Used the Hack Tool to hack an object at a distance.
description.french: Vous avez piraté un objet à distance à l'aide de l'outil de piratage.
description.german: Ein Objekt aus der Distanz mit dem Hack-Werkzeug gehackt.
description.italian: Grimaldello elettronico usato per aggirare un oggetto a distanza.
description.japanese: ハッキング・ガンで遠くの目標をハッキングした
description.spanish: Has usado la pirateadora automática para piratear un objeto a distancia.
description.schinese: 已用破解枪远程破解一个目标。

description.english: Hacked one of each kind of machine.
description.french: Vous avez piraté tous les types de machines.
description.german: Jede Art von Maschine gehackt.
description.italian: Aggirato ogni tipo di macchina.
description.japanese: 全ての種類の機械をそれぞれ1つハッキングした
description.spanish: Has pirateado una máquina de cada tipo.
description.schinese: 已破解所有类型的机器。

description.english: Hacked 30 machines at a distance with the Hack Tool.
description.french: Vous avez piraté 30 machines à distance à l'aide de l'outil de piratage.
description.german: 30 Maschinen aus der Distanz mit dem Hacker-Werkzeug gehackt.
description.italian: Aggirate 30 macchine a distanza con il grimaldello elettronico.
description.japanese: 離れたマシンを30台ハッキングした
description.spanish: Has pirateado 30 máquinas a distancia con la pirateadora automática.
description.schinese: 已用破解枪远程破解30台机器。

description.english: Found every Power to the People weapon upgrades in the game.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé toutes les améliorations ''Pouvoir au Peuple'' du jeu.
description.german: Alle 'Alle Macht dem Volke' Waffenupgrades im Spiel gefunden.
description.italian: Trovati tutti i potenziamenti per armi presso le macchine Power to the People.
description.japanese: 全14箇所の武器強化ステーションを見つけた
description.spanish: Has conseguido todas las mejoras de armas 'Poder para el pueblo' del juego.
description.schinese: 已找到游戏中所有的人民力量武器升级。

description.english: Researched a Splicer with the Research Camera.
description.french: Vous avez effectué une recherche sur un Chrosôme à l'aide de la caméra de recherche.
description.german: Einen Splicer mit der Forschungskamera erforscht.
description.italian: Effettuata una ricerca su un ricombinante con la telecamera genetica.
description.japanese: リサーチカメラを使ってスプライサーを研究した
description.spanish: Has investigado a un splicer con la cámara de investigación.
description.schinese: 已用研究相机研究修补者。

description.english: Maxed out one Research Track.
description.french: Vous avez terminé une piste de recherche.
description.german: Einen Forschungszweig maximiert.
description.italian: Ampliata al massimo una categoria di ricerca.
description.japanese: 研究トラックの1つを全て埋めた
description.spanish: Has investigado al máximo una categoría de investigación.
description.schinese: 已将一个研究领域彻底完成。

description.english: Completed all research on every subject in Rapture.
description.french: Vous avez réalisé toutes les recherches sur tous les sujets de Rapture.
description.german: Die Erforschung jedes Objekts in Rapture abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completate tutte le ricerche possibili sui soggetti di Rapture.
description.japanese: 全ての研究対象物を限界まで研究した
description.spanish: Has terminado la investigación de todos los sujetos de Rapture.
description.schinese: 已完成极乐城中所有对象的研究。

description.english: Defeated 3 Big Daddies without dying during a fight.
description.french: Vous avez tué 3 Protecteurs au cours d'un combat sans mourir.
description.german: 3 Big Daddys besiegt, ohne im Kampf zu sterben.
description.italian: Sconfitti 3 Big Daddy senza morire.
description.japanese: 戦闘中に死なずに3体のビッグダディを倒した
description.spanish: Has vencido a 3 Big Daddies sin morir en la pelea.
description.schinese: 已在一场战斗中以不死的状态解决3只大老爹。

description.english: Adopted a new Little Sister for the first time.
description.french: Vous avez adopté une première Petite Soeur.
description.german: Zum ersten Mal eine neue Little Sister adoptiert.
description.italian: Sorellina adottata per la prima volta.
description.japanese: リトルシスターを初めて保護した
description.spanish: Has adoptado a una nueva Little Sister por primera vez.
description.schinese: 已第一次收养新的小妹妹。

description.english: Gather 600 ADAM with Little Sisters.
description.french: Vous avez récolté 600 ADAM avec les Petites Soeurs.
description.german: Mit Little Sisters 600 ADAM gesammelt.
description.italian: Raccolte 600 unità di Adam con le Sorelline.
description.japanese: リトルシスターと一緒に600ADAM集めた
description.spanish: Has recolectado 600 de ADAM con Little Sisters.
description.schinese: 用小妹妹收集600份亚当物质。

description.english: Fully upgraded one Plasmid to the Level 3 version.
description.french: Vous avez amélioré un de vos Plasmides au niveau 3.
description.german: Komplettes Upgrade eines Plasmids auf Level 3.
description.italian: Un plasmide potenziato fino al livello 3.
description.japanese: プラスミドの1つをレベル3までアップグレードした
description.spanish: Has mejorado completamente un plásmido hasta la versión de nivel 3.
description.schinese: 已将一种质体升至3级完全版。

description.english: Found or purchased all 11 basic Plasmid types.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu les 11 Plasmides de base.
description.german: Alle 11 einfachen Plasmidarten gefunden oder gekauft.
description.italian: Trovate o acquistate tutte le 11 versioni di base dei plasmidi.
description.japanese: 全11種類のプラスミドを入手した
description.spanish: Has conseguido o comprado los 11 tipos básicos de plásmidos.
description.schinese: 找到或购买全部11种基本质体。

description.english: Defended yourself against the Big Sister without dying.
description.french: Vous êtes sorti vivant d'un combat contre la Grande Soeur.
description.german: Gegen die Big Sister gewehrt, ohne zu sterben.
description.italian: Sopravvissuto all'assalto della Big Sister.
description.japanese: 死なずにビッグシスターからの攻撃に耐え抜いた
description.spanish: Te has defendido de la Big Sister sin morir.
description.schinese: 已在不死的状态下抵御大姐姐的攻击。

description.english: Killed 50 enemies using only hacked Security.
description.french: Vous avez tué 50 ennemis à l'aide de robots de sécurité piratés.
description.german: 50 Gegner nur mit gehackten Sicherheitsvorrichtungen ausgeschaltet.
description.italian: Uccisi 50 nemici usando solo i dispositivi di sicurezza aggirati.
description.japanese: ハッキングしたセキュリティーだけで50体の敵を倒した
description.spanish: Has matado a 50 enemigos usando solamente seguridad pirateada.
description.schinese: 仅用被破解的安保机器击败50名敌人。

description.english: Killed 30 enemies using only Traps.
description.french: Vous avez tué 30 ennemis à l'aide de pièges.
description.german: 30 Gegner nur mit Fallen ausgeschaltet.
description.italian: Uccisi 30 nemici usando solo trappole.
description.japanese: トラップだけで30体の敵を倒した
description.spanish: Has matado a 30 enemigos usando solamente trampas.
description.schinese: 已仅用陷阱击败30名敌人。

description.english: Killed an enemy with its own projectile.
description.french: Vous avez tué un ennemi avec son propre projectile.
description.german: Einen Gegner mit seinem eigenen Geschoss ausgeschaltet.
description.italian: Hai ucciso un nemico con un suo proiettile.
description.japanese: 敵の爆弾を投げ返して、その敵を倒した
description.spanish: Has matado a un enemigo con su propio proyectil.
description.schinese: 已用敌人自己的投掷物将其击败。

description.english: Got through a Gather with no damage and no one getting to the Little Sister.
description.french: Protégez une Petite Soeur durant une récolte sans que personne ne la touche, ni subir de dégâts.
description.german: Unverletzt geblieben, während die Little Sister ungestört ADAM sammelte.
description.italian: Porta a termine una raccolta senza subire danni e senza alcun disturbo per la Sorellina.
description.japanese: ノーダメージで誰もリトルシスターに触れさせずにADAM採取を完了させた
description.spanish: Supera una recolección intacto y sin que nadie llegue a la Little Sister.
description.schinese: 已在不受伤害且无人碰到小妹妹的情况下完成一次采集。

description.english: Spent 2000 Dollars at Vending Machines.
description.french: Vous avez dépensé 2000 dollars dans les distributeurs.
description.german: 2.000 Dollar an Verkaufsautomaten ausgegeben.
description.italian: Spesi 2.000 dollari ai distributori.
description.japanese: 自動販売機で2000ドル使った
description.spanish: Has gastado 2.000 dólares en máquinas expendedoras.
description.schinese: 已在自动售货机上花费2000美元。

displayName.japanese: 全リトルシスター解放した
displayName.spanish: Tratado con todas las Little Sisters

description.english: Dealt with every Little Sister.
description.french: Vous vous êtes occupé de toutes les Petites Soeurs.
description.german: Jede Little Sister getroffen.
description.italian: Interagito con tutte le Sorelline.
description.japanese: 全てのリトルシスターを搾取または救助した
description.spanish: Te has ocupado de todas las Little Sisters.
description.schinese: 已与所有的小妹妹打过交道。

description.english: Finished the game on the hardest difficulty level.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu en difficulté maximale.
description.german: Das Spiel auf der höchsten Schwierigkeitsstufe beendet.
description.italian: Gioco finito al livello di difficoltà più elevato.
description.japanese: 最も難しい難易度でゲームをクリアした
description.spanish: Has terminado el juego en el mayor nivel de dificultad.
description.schinese: 已在最高难度下通关游戏。

description.english: Saved every Little Sister and spared Grace, Stanley, and Gil.
description.french: Vous avez sauvé toutes les Petites Soeurs et épargné Grace, Stanley et Gilbert Alexandre.
description.german: Jede Little Sister gerettet und Grace, Stanley und Gil verschont.
description.italian: Tutte le Sorelline salvate e Grace, Stanley e Gil risparmiati.
description.japanese: 全てのリトルシスターを救済し  グレース  スタンレー  ギルを許した
description.spanish: Has salvado a todas las Little Sister y perdonado a Grace, Stanley y Gil.
description.schinese: 已救出所有小妹妹，且饶了格蕾丝、斯坦利和吉尔一命。

displayName.italian: Due palle di ottone grosse così

description.english: Finished the game without using Vita-Chambers.
description.french: Vous avez fini le jeu sans utiliser les Vita-Chambres.
description.german: Spiel abgeschlossen, ohne Vita-Chambers verwendet zu haben.
description.italian: Finito il gioco senza aver mai usato le Camere della vita.
description.japanese: ヴィタチャンバーを使わずにゲームをクリアした
description.spanish: Has acabado el juego sin usar las Vita-Cámaras.
description.schinese: 已通关游戏且没有使用重生舱。

description.english: Find 100 Audio Diaries.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé 100 journaux audio.
description.german: 100 Audiotagebücher gefunden.
description.italian: Tutti i diari trovati.
description.japanese: ダイアリーを100個見つけた
description.spanish: Has encontrado 100 entradas de diario.
description.schinese: 找到100份音频日记。

description.english: Paid your respects to the founder of Rapture.
description.french: Vous avez rendu hommage au fondateur de Rapture.
description.german: Dem Gründer von Rapture deinen Respekt erwiesen.
description.italian: Reso omaggio al fondatore di Rapture.
description.japanese: ラプチャーの創始者に敬意を示した
description.spanish: Has presentado tus respetos al fundador de Rapture.
description.schinese: 向极乐城的创始人致敬。

description.english: Earned 6 stars in the Protector Trials
description.french: 6 étoiles gagnées dans les épreuves de Protecteur
description.german: 6 Sterne in den Protektor-Prüfungen verdient.
description.italian: Ottenute 6 stelle nelle Prove protettore
description.japanese: プロテクター・トライアルでスターを 6 つ手に入れた
description.spanish: Has ganado 6 estrellas en las pruebas de protector
description.schinese: 已在保护者试炼中获得6颗星。

description.english: Earned 18 stars in the Protector Trials
description.french: 18 étoiles gagnées dans les épreuves de Protecteur
description.german: 18 Sterne in den Protektor-Prüfungen verdient.
description.italian: Ottenute 18 stelle nelle Prove protettore
description.japanese: プロテクター・トライアルでスターを 18 個手に入れた
description.spanish: Has ganado 18 estrellas en las pruebas de protector
description.schinese: 已在保护者试炼中获得18颗星。

description.english: Earned 36 stars in the Protector Trials
description.french: 36 étoiles gagnées dans les épreuves de Protecteur
description.german: 36 Sterne in den Protektor-Prüfungen verdient.
description.italian: Ottenute 36 stelle nelle Prove protettore
description.japanese: プロテクター・トライアルでスターを 36 個手に入れた
description.spanish: Has ganado 36 estrellas en las pruebas de protector
description.schinese: 已在保护者试炼中获得36颗星。

description.english: Earned an A rank in all Protector Trials
description.french: Toutes les épreuves de Protecteur terminées avec un rang A
description.german: Einen A-Rang in allen Protektor-Prüfungen verdient.
description.italian: Ottenuto il livello A in tutte le Prove protettore
description.japanese: 全てのプロテクター・トライアルで A ランクを獲得した
description.spanish: Has conseguido una nota de A en todas las pruebas de protector
description.schinese: 已在所有保护者试炼中赢得A级评价

description.english: Completed all bonus Protector Trials
description.french: Toutes les épreuves de Protecteur terminées
description.german: Alle Protektor-Bonusprüfungen abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completate tutte le Prove protettore bonus
description.japanese: 全てのボーナスプロテクター・トライアルを完了した
description.spanish: Has completado todas las pruebas de protector de bonificación
description.schinese: 已完成所有额外保护者试炼

description.english: Collected 100% of the ADAM in a single Protector Trial.
description.french: 100% de l'ADAM récupéré dans une épreuve de Protecteur
description.german: 100% des ADAMs in einer einzigen Protektor-Prüfung gesammelt.
description.italian: Raccolto il 100% di Adam in una Prova protettore
description.japanese: 1 つのプロテクター・トライアルで ADAM を 100% 採取した
description.spanish: Has recolectado el 100% del ADAM en una única prueba de protector
description.schinese: 在一项保护者试炼中收集100%亚当物质。

displayName.italian: Ci serve un secchio più grande

description.english: Collected 50% of the ADAM available in all Protector Trials.
description.french: 50% de l'ADAM disponible récupéré dans toutes les épreuves de Protecteur
description.german: 50% des in allen Protektor-Prüfungen verfügbaren ADAMs gesammelt.
description.italian: Raccolto il 50% dell'Adam disponibile in tutte le Prove protettore
description.japanese: 全てのプロテクター・トライアルで ADAM を 50% 採取した
description.spanish: Has recolectado el 50% del ADAM disponible en todas las pruebas de protector
description.schinese: 已在所有保护者试炼中收集50%可用的亚当物质。

description.english: Resolved all the Little Sisters in Minerva's Den
description.french: Vous avez retrouvé toutes les Petites Soeurs de l'Antre de Minerve.
description.german: Alle Little Sisters in Minerva's Den gerettet, oder ausgebeutet.
description.italian: Hai deciso il destino di tutte le Sorelline del Minerva's Den.
description.japanese: ミネルバズ・デンにいるリトルシスター全員と出会う
description.spanish: Has resuelto todas las Little Sisters de la Guarida de Minerva.
description.schinese: 处理密涅瓦之室里所有的小妹妹

description.english: Kill a Lancer Big Daddy
description.french: Vous avez tué un Protecteur \
description.german: Erledige einen Lancer Big Daddy.
description.italian: Hai ucciso un Big Daddy Lanciere.
description.japanese: ビッグダディ「ランサー」を倒す
description.spanish: Has matado a un Big Daddy lancero.
description.schinese: 消灭一个枪骑兵大老爹

description.english: Destroyed all 10 Vacuum Bots in Minerva's Den
description.french: Vous avez détruit les 10 robots de nettoyage de l'Antre de Minerve.
description.german: Alle 10 Staubsauger-Bots in Minerva's Den zerstört.
description.italian: Hai distrutto tutti i 10 robot aspirapolvere del Minerva's Den.
description.japanese: ミネルバズ・デンにあるバキュームボットを 10 体全て破壊する
description.spanish: Has destruido los 10 bots aspiradores de la Guarida de Minerva.
description.schinese: 已摧毁密涅瓦之室里全部10个扫地机器人

description.english: Reached Rapture Central Computing Operations
description.french: Vous avez atteint le Service de l'Exploitation de Rapture Central Computing.
description.german: Operative Abteilung von Rapture Central Computing erreicht.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il settore operativo della Rapture Central Computing.
description.japanese: ラプチャー中央コンピュータに到達する
description.spanish: Has llegado a Operaciones, en el computador central de Rapture.
description.schinese: 已到达极乐城中心处理室

displayName.japanese: root アクセスを許可します

description.english: Reached Computer Core Access
description.french: Vous avez réussi à accéder au noyau de l’ordinateur.
description.german: Computerkernzugang erreicht.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto l'accesso al nucleo del computer.
description.japanese: ラプチャー中央コンピュータのメインフレーム中核部に到達する
description.spanish: Has conseguido acceso al núcleo del ordenador.
description.schinese: 已到达运算核心

description.english: Wrested control of the Thinker from Reed Wahl
description.french: Vous avez repris le contrôle du Penseur des mains de Reed Wahl.
description.german: Reed Wahl die Kontrolle über den Thinker abgenommen.
description.italian: Hai sottratto il Pensatore al controllo di Reed Wahl.
description.japanese: リード・ワールからシンカーの制御を奪い取る
description.spanish: Has conseguido quitar el control del Pensador a Reed Wahl.
description.schinese: 已从里德·沃尔手中夺取思考者的控制权

description.english: Got 9999 points in one game of Spitfire
description.french: Vous avez marqué 9999 points dans une partie de Spitfire.
description.german: 9999 Punkte in einem Spitfire-Spiel erzielt.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto 9999 punti in una partita a Spitfire.
description.japanese: スピットファイア 1 ゲーム中に 9999 ポイント獲得する
description.spanish: Has conseguido 9999 puntos en una partida de Spitfire.
description.schinese: 已在一局《喷火战机》游戏中得到9999分

description.english: Escaped Minerva's Den
description.french: Vous avez fui l'Antre de Minerve.
description.german: Aus Minerva's Den entkommen.
description.italian: Sei fuggito dal Minerva's Den.
description.japanese: ミネルバズ・デンを脱出する
description.spanish: Has escapado de la Guarida de Minerva.
description.schinese: 已逃出密涅瓦之室
